verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Joseph took his wife and her Child
And they went to Africa
to escape teh rage of a deadly king
there along the banks of the Nile
Jesus listened to the song
that the captive childern used to sing

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
My deliverer is coming, my deliverer is standing by
my deliverer is coming, my deliverer is standing by

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
through a dry and thirsty land
water from the Kenyan Heights
pours itself into Lake Sangra's broken heart
there in the Sahara Land
